name: T Black Aviation
about: T Black Aviation is a comprehensive aviation training and service facility dedicated to providing top-notch education and support in the aviation industry. We offer a range of programs, including the Accelerated Aviation AcademicsÂ® and the FAA-certified Airframe and Powerplant (A&P) Mechanic Certification Program. Our facility is equipped with a Designated Mechanic Examiner (DME) on premise, ensuring convenient and efficient certification processes. We also administer all FAA written exams and operate a well-stocked pilot shop. With a focus on both theoretical knowledge and practical skills, T Black Aviation aims to prepare students for successful careers in aviation maintenance, repair, and piloting. Our experienced instructors and state-of-the-art resources make us a trusted choice for aspiring aviation professionals. Contact us today to start your aviation journey.
